1.0.1.name: wordpress/goldhat-widget
1.0.1.description:
This is the official WordPress widget for GoldHat. By using the GoldHat widget you can display to your readers just how much GoldHat users appreciate your great content. The widget displays number of donations made to your post, the total amount of donations as well as the name of the highest donor. If your post hasn't received any donations yet, the widget provides a way for users to quickly access the donations page for your post.

What's GoldHat all about? Check out our Welcome Page!
